defs: = ಕಟ್ಟೆಚ್ಚರ.
to be built, constructed.
a casual talk, useless gossip etc., that people have, sitting on the public platforms in villages, usu. in the evenings.
a body of people having religion, caste, etc., in common; a community.
a public platform of a local, informal court confined either to a caste or to a village.
a house (usu. in a village) having a slightly raised platform in the frontage.
the house of the village-chief or the community-head.
ಕಟ್ಟೆಮನೆ ಯಜಮಾನ kaṭṭemane yajamāna the chief of a caste, religion, etc. in a village.
the act of shaping articles beautifully in a mould.
a well grown wing (of a bird).
a strong piece of bone.
a kind of net (for catching wild animals).
extraordinary, charming beauty.
the quality of being constructed, textured or made well.
extraordinary valour, courage.
to fold back the edge of (a garment) and sew down; put a hem or hems on; to beautify the edge (of a garment).
water boiled well for cooking food.
a delicious liquid food (after taking out vegetables cooked in it) used to mix with boiled rice.
a forceful or vehement shooting of an arrow.
to shoot an arrow forcefully or in anger.
= ಕಟ್ಟೆಹೋಗು.
to become dry; to lose water by evaporation or percolation; to become dry or sapless.
excessive or deep love or affection.
a complete surrendering to another.
fall upon vehemently or cruelly.
a condition of meeting, discussing, counselling etc., that is limited strictly to certain number of trustworthy people (usu. happening between two persons).
a place where people meet secretely for discussing confidential matters.
to sustain heavy injury.
marked aversion aroused by something highly distasteful; that which causes strong loathsomeness; sickening distaste.
unabatable envy.
the state of being or doing very well in respect of material wealth, health, social status.
a very big gathering of people.
a suprme woman leader; a female absolute leader; a supremo.
to go beyond the bounds or limits set by (a commandment, law, etc.); to violate social or moral standards; to infringe.
to fail to follow the terms of one's promise, agreement, etc; to break one's promise.
(masc.) a suprme leader; an absolute leader; a supremo.
the office, status of a supreme leader.
to become dry completely.
an emphatic persuasion or coercive compulsion.
(dial.) the act of hurrying impatiently or unduly.
the act of removing restrictions, restraints; a freeing from imprisonment.
= ಕಟ್ಟೊತ್ತಂಬ.
to become wild from anger.
the quality or state of being very elegant or highly tidy.
a strong, impenetrable hedge.
excessive or deep love or affection.
= ಕಟ್ಟೊಲುಮೆ.
a rich source (of esp. water from unerground).
to shout, scream very loudly in fright or pain.
the act or an instance of screaming, wailing very loudly in a distressed situation.
food that is put in cans, boxes, etc. and ready to eat, made for a traveller.
boiled rice mixed with soup, broth, sauce, curry, etc.
anything that is built with walls and a roof, as a house or factory; something built or constructed, as a building or dam; a building.
manner of building, constructing or organizing; the style or plan of construction; a set of interconnecting parts of any complex thing; a framework.
a royal court filled with large number of members.
a letter or written communication from a king's office.
a preserving with great care.
the state of (food) not being digested; indigestion.
a prescribed rule; an authoritative direction; the act of prescribing a rule; a regulating or regulation; a code.
(dance.) a hand gesture in which fingers are used to depict different sentiments.
a unit of weight (in weighing gold, pearls etc.).
the arrangement made for offering of food to a deity.
a prescribed service (as to a temple, religious teahers, monks, etc.).
an opportunity or obligation etc. that comes successively to each of several persons etc.
a specified or prescribed length of time.
an established social convention carried on by tradition; a custom.
an action to secure justice instituted in a court of law; a law-suit.
a fever that recurs in regular intervals.
the tree Calosanthes indica.
a man belonging to brāhmaṇa caste.
the auditory sensation produced by vibrations in air, water, etc.; sound.
a structure of railings held up by small posts, as on a staircase; a balustrade.
a tax levied based on number and size of the buildings for storing threshed grain (now obs.).
outstandingly good of its kind; of exceptional merit, virtue, etc.
that which is of superior quality.
a person of excellence, exceptional merit, virtue etc.
a string of excellent pearls.
= ಕಠಾರಿ.
a soldier who fights with a dagger.
a weapon with a short, pointed blade, used for stabbing; a dagger.
a mode of wearing dhōti, tucking one hem in to the waist band, as soldiers would do while fighting in olden days.
= ಕಠಾರಾಯಿತ.
a waist band to which a dagger is attached.
(a title) a soldier who fights bravely with a dagger.
= ಕಠಾರಿರಾಯ.

hard - a) not easily dented, pierced, cut or crushed; resistant to pressure; firm and unyielding to the touch; rigid; solid and compact; b) demanding great physical or mental effort or labor; fatiguing; difficult; esp. difficult to do, difficult to understand, explain or answer, difficult to deal with; not easily managed or controlled; c) not easily moved; unfeeling; callous; unfriendly; hostile; d) harsh; severe; stern.
= ಕಠಿಣತೆ.
any of a subphylum (Crustacea) of arthropods, including shrimps, crabs, barnacles, and lobsters, that have a hard outer shell; a crustacean.
the quality or fact of being harsh, hard, severe or strict; hardness; harshness; severity.
= ಕಠಿಣ1.
= ಕಠಿಣ2.
an unyielding, unrelenting, unfeeling, cruel man; a hard-hearted man.
the quality of such a man.
an unyielding, unrelenting, unfeeling, cruel woman; a hard-hearted woman.
= ಕಠಿಣತೆ.
to become hard, severe or unrelenting.
= ಕಠಿಣತೆ.
a punishment (usu. within a jail) that is very harsh.
= ಕಠಿನಚಿತ್ತ.
= ಕಠಿನಚಿತ್ತೆ.
the vine Momordica charantia of Cucurbitaceae family and its bitter gourd.
the vine Cucumis colocynthis and its fruit.

hard - a) not easily dented, pierced, cut or crushed; resistant to pressure; firm and unyielding to the touch; rigid; solid and compact; b) demanding great physical or mental effort or labor; fatiguing; difficult; esp. difficult to do, difficult to understand, explain or answer, difficult to deal with; not easily managed or controlled; c) not easily moved; unfeeling; callous; unfriendly; hostile; d) harsh; severe; stern.
a fast, forceful movement.
the harshness or severity that one has in his or her life.
the quality or fact of being harsh, hard, severe or strict; hardness; harshness; severity.
very harsh, very cruel.
= ಕಠೋರತನ.
harsh, pungent speech, intended to inflict mental pain.
something lent, esp. a sum of money to be returned; a loan; the thing or money loaned.

ಕಡ ಹುಟ್ಟಿ ಬಡವ ಕೆಟ್ಟ kaḍa huṭṭi baḍava keṭṭa hewho goes a borrowing goes a sorrowing; ಕಡ ಸಿಕ್ಕುವುದಾದರೆ, ಹಡಗೇ ನನಗಿರಲಿ kaḍa sikkuvudādare, haḍagē nanagirali borrowing tempts one to be always acquisitive.
a shallow place in a stream, river, etc., where one can cross; a ford; a place or route of carriage over water; the place where a ferry docks on either shore; a ferry.
a largedeer (Cervus unicolor) with coarse hair, a short, erectile mane, and three-pointed antlers; an Indian sambar.
a stretch of rising land at the edge of a body of water, esp. a river.
a basin at the bottom of a tree or a levelled wet agricultural land with raised mound on all sides, for holding water.
a flat, coarse fabric made of straw used as a floor covering or sitting on; a straw mat.
the outskirts of a city or a town.
a time; period of time; a season.
the hip and loins; the hollow above the hips.
the fleshy side of a person or animal between the ribs and the hip; the flank.
a dead of a person; corpse.
a place for the burial or cremation of the dead bodies; a cemetry; a crematory.
a portable framework on which a corpse is carried.
a long, broad, thick wooden board; a plank.
a plant lasting or living only one year or season.
The grass Saccharum sara (= S. munja) of Poaceae family.
plentifulness; bountifulness; excessiveness; abundance.
either of the flat surfaces alongside the forehead, in front of each ear of an elephant; the temples.
either of the two bones or bony parts that hold the teeth and frame the mouth in most vertebrates; the jaw.
a pointed straight missile to be shot from a bow; an arrow.
a social convention carried on by tradition and enforced by social disapproval of any violation; a ustom.
the fine, dustlike mass of grains that are produced in the anthers or microspore sacs of seed plants, containing the male sexual cells (gametophytes) of the plant; pollen.
to be having or showing great enthusiasm, zeal or fervour.
a human body without the head; the trunk.
a large metal container for holding or boiling water.
an ornamental metal band or chain (esp. of gold or silver) worn around the wrist; a bracelet.
the broken outer coat or husk, of grains of wheat, rye, oats, etc. separated from the flour after grinding, as by sifting; bran.
a short thick stick used as a weapon; a cudgel.
to give courage, confidence or hope to; to encourage.
to give courage, hope or confidence to; to embolden; to hearten.
to be enraged, infuriated; to become angry.
to get excited; to get one's feelings or passions aroused.
to be enthusiastic; to be zealous.
to act with courage or audacity; to be fearless; to venture.
to be feeling or showing keen desire; to be impatient or anxious to do or get; to be ardent.
to hurry; to hasten.
a strong desire.
great vigour or liveliness (as influenced by a favourable, enjoyable, pleasant situation).
a deep defensive ditch round a castle, town, etc., usu. filled with water; a moat.
an artificial waterway for irrigation; a canal.
a very small inlet from a waterway into a wet agricultural land for allowing water flow slowly.
= ಕಡಂಗೊಡು.
to lend; to loan - a) to grant (to a person) the use of (a thing) on the understanding that it or its equivalent shall be returned; b) to allow the use of (money) usu. at interest.
a) to take a thing (from another person) on the understanding that it or its equivalent shall be returned; b) to make use of another's money usu. at interest.

any of various families of winged hymenopteran insects, characterised by a slender body with the abdomen attached by a narrow stalk, biting mouthparts, and, in the females and workers, a vicious sting that can be used repeatedly; a wasp.
= ಕಡಂಜ.
= ಕಡಂಜ.
the tree Anthocephalus indicus (= A. cadamba, = Nauclea cadamba) of Rubiaceae family; cadamba tree.
= ಕಡಂಗೊಳ್.
a sweet sap drawn from the cadamba tree (Anthocephalus indicus).
(fig.) a useless person.
any of several brightly coloured venomous elapid snakes of the genus Bungarus, of the Indian subcontinent and south-east Asia; a krait.
to take athing or money from another on the understanding that it or its equivalent shall be returned.
strong - a) governing or leading with firm authority; authoritarian; b) intense in degree or quality; not mild.
arrangement - a) the act or process of arranging or being arranged; b) the condition of being arranged; the manner in which a thing is arranged.
= ಕಡಗಟ್ಟು1.
a sudden, explosive sound, of or as of clapping.
= ಕಡಗತ್ತಿ.
the plant Entada monastachyal 2) its pod (used as a vegetable).
= ಕಡಕಲು.
a small gate in a hedge or an enclosure-wall, just to allow a person to enter in; a wicket-gate.
an ornament of gold with a pearl, for the ears, worn by men.
a projectile of lead (orig. round but now usu. cylindrical and pointed) for firing from a rifle, revolver, etc; a bullet.
breakage - a) the act or an instance of breaking; b) a broken thing; c) damage caused by breaking.
a strong desire.
great vigour or liveliness (as influenced by a favourable, enjoyable, pleasant situation).
the plant Bauhinia diphylla of Caesalpiniaceae family; Malbar ebony.
an ornamental metal (esp. of gold or silver) band or chain worn around the wrist; a bracelet.
an ornament or fetter worn round the ankle; an anklet.
the religious status of a woman whose husband is alive.
ಕಡಗ ಕಾಯು kaḍaga kāyu (fig.) to protect a married woman's auspicious status in the society, by protecting her husband.
a kind of tree.
a groove made on wood or stone (as in sculpture).
the act or business of lending and borrowing; financial transactions; banking.
a building, esp. a house, having two or more floors, one above the other; a multi-storeyed building.
a tool with a curved or hooked blade at one end, for pruning and cutting; a bill-hook.
the plant Mitragyna parvifolia (=Stephegyne parvifolia) of Rubiaceae family; water cadamba.
= ಕಡಗೋಲು1.
a man who owes something to another or others; a loanee; a debtor.
an unripe fruit of the jack tree (Artocarpus integra of Moraceae family).
to give courage, hope or confidence to; to embolden; to hearten.
to be enraged, infuriated; to become angry.
to get excited; to get one's feelings or passions aroused.
to be enthusiastic; to be zealous.
to act wth courage or audacity; to be fearless; to venture.
to be feeling or showing keen desire; to be impatient or anxious to do or get; to be ardent.
an artificial waterway for irrigation; a canal.
a very small inlet from a waterway into a wet agricultural land for allowing water flow slowly.
a shallow place in a stream, river, etc., where one can cross; a ford.
a place or route of carriage over water.
the place where a ferry docks on either shore; a ferry.
a deep defensive ditch round a castle, town, etc., usu. filled with water.
= ಕಡಗೊಡು.
a burden either bundled or packed in a big bag.
to lend; to loan - a) to grant (to a person) the use of (a thing) on the understanding that it or its equivalent shall be returned; b) to allow the use of (money) usu. at interest.
a) to take a thing (from another person) on the understanding that it or its equivalent shall be returned; b) to make use of another's money usu. at interest.
the plant Aconitum napellus of Ranunculaceae family.
a stick with a disc-like part, with zig-zag teeth, at one end for churning curd; a churning stick.
the annual herb Lycopersicum esculentum of Solanaceae family.
its berry; tomato.
the grass Panicum ciliare of Poaceae family.
the disc-like part, with zig-zag teeth, of a churning stick.
the tree Nauclea parviflora of Rubiaceae family.
the evergreen tree Garcinia cambogia of Guttiferae family.
the act of shaping wood, metal rod, ivory, etc. into required shape by turning it rapidly on a lathe against the edge of a cutting or abrading tool.
the lathe used for this.
a long metal stick with a flat end on one side used to turn or stir the food being cooked in a vessel or baked or fried on a pan; a roasting jack.
the tree Acacia speciosa of Mimosae family; sirissa tree.
= ಕಡಚಲು.
= ಕಡಜೀರಿಗೆ - 1.
a kind of plant.
a kind of plant.

any of various families of winged hymenopteran insects, characterised by a slender body with the abdomen attached by a narrow stalk, biting mouthparts, and, in the females and workers, a vicious sting that can be used repeatedly; a wasp.
a seed of a plant, used for medicinal purpose.
the hair that has interwoven, felted or tangled together into a thick mass; a matted hair; a felt of hair.
a black canvas to write on with a piece of chalk; a canvas board.
a set of papers, documents or records; a file.
ಕಡತ ಬಿಚ್ಚು kaḍata biccu to open the file (in an office for processing it or taking action on it).
(fig.) to tell a long account of or old story.
a cylindrical case of cardboard, metal, etc. containing the charge and primer, and usu. the projectile, for a firearm; a cartridge.
to shield from injury or danger; to guard; to defend; to protect.
to make complete; to accomplish.
to reach the end; to come to a close.
to be relieved from distress, danger, disease, etc.
= ಕಡಜೀರಿಗೆ - 1.
the art of making forms, sculpturing by chiselling stone, carving wood, modelling clay, casting metal, etc.; sculpture.
a tool with a curved or hooked blade at one end, for pruning and cutting; a bill-hook.
a large deer (Cervus unicolor) with coarse hair, a short, erectile mane, and three-pointed antlers; an Indian sambar.
a lending of money at interest.
a sweet sap drawn from the cadamba tree (Anthocephalus indicus).
(fig.) a useless person.
= ಕಡಬ.
the tree Anthocephalus indicus (= A. cadamba, = Nauclea cadamba) of Rubiaceae family; cadamba tree.
(dial.) = ಕಡಬ.
the state or condition of being deficient; deficiency.
the shortage in required or normal quantity or number.
that which is left over after part is taken away; remainder; rest.
the quality or fact of being inferior.
a huge rock in a river that splits the water flowing down.
the expanse of salt water that covers most of the earth's surface and surrounds its land masses; sea.
ಕಡಲ ತರಕಾರಿ kaḍala tarakāri any sea fish that can be used as food; ಕಡಲ ಮಗಳು kaḍala magaḷu = ಕಡಲಣುಗಿ; ಕಡಲೊಳ್ ಪಟ್ಟಂ kaḍaloḷ paṭṭam Viṣṇu, whose couch is on the sea.

any of a genus (Hippocampus) of small, semitropical, marine bony fishes of the same family (Syngnathidae order Gasterosteiformes) as the pipefishes, having a slender prehensile tail, plated body, and a head and foreparts somewhat suggestive of those of a horse, and the male of which incubates the eggs in a pouch in his abdomen; a sea horse.
(myth.) the Moon, who was born from the sea.
Goddess Lakṣmi, who was, as per mythology, born from the sea.
= ಕಡಲಣುಗಿ.
= ಕಡಲ ಹೂ.
= ಕಡಲುನಾಲಗೆ.

any of an order (Sirenia) of large, vegetarian sea mammals with a cigar-shaped body, a blunt snout, large and mobile lips, flipper-like forelimbs, and a tail fluke, consisting of the dugong and manatee; a sirenian; a sea cow.
any of several gorgonians, of Gorgonaceae order, with the axial skeleton formed into a fanlike structure; a sea fan.
any of several genera of large eared seals without underfur, usu. living in colonies along the coastline of the Pacific Ocean; a sea lion.
any of echinoderms of Holothuroidea class, with an elongated, flexible, worm-like body and a mouth surrounded by tentacles; a sea cucumber; a holothurian.
a shorebird of Laridae family, with webbed feet, a deeply forked tail, a straight bill, and a slender body; a sea swallow; a tern.
any of a large subfamily (Hydrophiinae) of poisonous elapine snakes with a flattened, oarlike tail, living in tropical seas; a sea snake.

any of an order (Actiniaria) of flowerlike, anthozoan sea polyps having a firm, gelatinous, often large, body without a skeleton, topped with petal-like tentacles, that are often brightly coloured and live attached to rocks, pilings, etc.; a sea anemone.
Viṣṇu, the consort of Goddess Lakṣmi, who was, as per mythology, born from the sea.
a man whose profession is to dive into sea to get pearls, corals etc.
Varuṇa, the mythological lord of seas.
either of two very large, earless seals (genus Mirounga), the male of which has a long proboscis; a sea elephant.
any of a large and widely distributed order (Testudines) of terrestrial or aquatic reptiles having a toothless beak and a soft body encased in a tough shell; a sea turtle.
to flow in huge quantity.
(people) to be gathered, assembled or move in great numbers.
a kind of wick for the lamps.
to go into, drown in the sea.
= ಕಡಲ್2.
(dial.) a kind of fish.
= ಕಡಲುಗಾಲುವೆ.
= ಕಡಲ್ಗಳ್ಳ.
= ಕಡಲ್ಗಳ್ಳತನ.
= ಕಡಲ್ಗಾಲುವೆ.
a huge bell to give warnings to persons going into the sea.
the foam of the sea.
the internal shell of cuttlefish, used as a food supplement for caged birds or as a polishing agent, once considered as the foam of the sea; cuttlefish-bone.
the fire (or the fire-energy) of the sea; marine-fire.
= ಕಡಲ್ವರಿ.

a massive, arctic sea carnivore (Odobenus rosmarus) of the same family (Otariidae) as the eared seals, having two tusks projecting from the upper jaw, a thick mustache, a very thick hide, and a heavy layer of blubber; a walrus.
the ray-fish Raja binoculata of the genus Raja, having a pointed snout; a big skate.
the porpoise Delphinus Gangāticus, an aquatic animal.
the annual plant Cicer arientinum of Papilonaceae.
its pea; Bengal gram.

ಕಡಲೆ ಸಂಗಡ ರಾಗಿ ಹುರಿದ ಹಾಗೆ kaḍale sangaḍa rāgi hurida hāge (proverbial simile) it is like trying to bring two persons of heterogeneous character, differing completely with each other, for a common cause; ಕಡಲೆ ತಿಂದು ಕೈ ತೊಳೆದಹಾಗೆ kaḍale tindu kai toḷedahāge (simile) completing of a work neatly and without any hassle; ಕಡಲೆಗೆ ಮುಂದು, ಕಡಿವಾಣಕ್ಕೆ ಹಿಂದು kaḍalege mundu, kaḍiv āṇakke hindu (said of a person who comes forward for availing the benefits but not for the labour; let somebody work, but let the benefits be mine; ಕಡಲೆಗೆ ಬಾಯಿತೆರೆದು, ಕಡಿವಾಣಕ್ಕೆ ಬಾಯಿ ಮುಚ್ಚಿದರೆಆದೀತೆ? kaḍalege bāyiteredu kaḍiv āṇakke bāyi muccidare ādīte? (prov.) till the land if you want to reap the crop; ಕಡಲೆಯಿದ್ದಾಗ ಹಲ್ಲಿಲ್ಲ kaḍaleyiddāga hallilla one gets wealth and resources when he he cannot enjoy them, like getting a comb when one is bald.
the sprading, annual plant Arachis hypogea of Papilionceae family.
its pod ripening underground containing one to three edible and oil-yielding seeds; pea nut.
the pea of Cicer arientinum of Papilionaceae family.
any of various sea Myna, the tropical starlings of India.
the creeper Cylista seariosa of Papilionaceae family.
the Bengal gram; the split chicken pea, (of Cicer arientinum).
the thorny plant Acanthospermum hispidum of Asteraceae family.
= ಕಡಲೆಹಿಟ್ಟು.
the flour of Bengal gram (the pea of Cicer arientinum).
juice extracted from the green pulse and the leaves of Cicer arientinum, the chicken pea.
= ಕಡಲಾಣ್ಮ.
= ಕಡಲಾಣ್ಮ.
the reflux of the tide toward the sea; ebb.
= ಕಡಲ್ಗರೆ.
(water, tear, blood etc.) to be collected and stored in large quantity.
(fig.)(anything) to be in very large quantity or number.
land alongside the sea; seashore; coast.
a man who practices piracy; esp., a robber of ships on the high seas; a pirate.
robbery of ships on the high seas; piracy.
a length of water wider than a strait, joining two larger areas, esp. seas; a channel.
= ಕಡಲುರಿ.

a sea horse - a) a massive, arctic sea carnivore (Odobenus rosmarus) of the same family (Otariidae) as the eared seals, having two tusks projecting from the upper jaw, a thick mustache, a very thick hide, and a heavy layer of blubber; a walrus; b) any of various fishes of the genus Hippocampus of the pipefish family (esp. Hippocampus hudsonius) having a prehensile tail, an elongated snout, and a head bent at right angles to the body; c) (myth.) a sea monster with the head and forequarters of a horse and the tail of a dolphin or fish; a hippocampus.
= ಕಡಲ್ಗರೆ.
the plant Lodoicea seyhellarum (= L.maldivica) of Arecaceae family; sea coconut.
to spread over a vast area (as the sea); to flow in excess of limits.
= ಕಡಲ್ವರಿ.
to enter into or drown in the sea.
the tree Anthocephalus indicus (= A. cadamba, = Nauclea cadamba) of Rubiaceae family; cadamba tree.
a large deer (Cervus unicolor) with coarse hair, a short, erectile mane, and three-pointed antlers; an Indian sambar.
the plant Momordica cymbalaria (=M. tuberosa) of Cucurbitaceae family.
the plant Luffa graveolens of Cucurbitaceae family.
a portable shelter consisting of cloth, canvas, skins, etc. stretched over poles and attached to stakes; a tent.
wealth, esp. in the form of money, precious metals, jewels, etc. stored underground.
a heavy, yellow, inert, metallic chemical element with a high degree of ductility and malleability; gold.
any paper note issued by a government or an authorized bank or coin stamped by government authority, used as a medium of exchange and measure of value; money.
= ಕಡವಲ.
= ಕಡವ1.
the tanned hide of animals, as of deer, etc., used to sit on.
= ಕಡವ1.
the plant Mitragyna parvifolia (=Stephegyne parvifolia) of Rubiaceae family; water cadamba.
either of the corners of the mouth.
= ಕಡವ1.
= ಕಡವ1.
= ಕಡವಳ.
= ಕಡವ2.
= ಕಡವ1.
= ಕಡಹು2.
a man who carries people in a boat from one bank to the other of a river; a boatman.
a kind of grass.
= ಕಡವ1.
= ಕಡವ2.
the plant Argyreia nervosa (= A. speciosa) of Convolvulaceae family.
another plant Argyreia malabarica of the samily.
a young cow that has not borne a calf; a heifer.
a young animal.
a kind of tree.
its fruit.
= ಕಡವ1.
the art of making forms, sculpturing by chiselling stone, carving wood, modelling clay, casting metal, etc.; sculpture.
the act of churning milk for getting butter.
= ಕಡವ2.
= ಕಡಹು2.
the creeper Marsdenia volubilis of Asclepiadaceae family.
to untie a knot; to free from bondage, entanglement, etc.
a shallow place in a stream, river, etc., where one can cross; a ford.
a place or route of carriage over water; the place where a ferry docks on either shore; a ferry.
a levelled, wet agricultural land with raised mound on all sides, for holding water evenly.
the quality, state or fact of being certain; certainty.
that which is clearly said or precisely communicated or done.
rude strictness, precision or discipline.

ಕಡಿದು ಕಟ್ಟೆಹಾಕು kaḍidu kaṭṭehāku (said sarcasticaly or in anger) to achieve something that is great or difficult; 'you have done a tremendous job' . ಕಡಿದಾಟ kaḍidāṭa (fig.) a mutual beating; ಕಡಿದಾಡು kaḍidāḍu (fig.) to beat mutually (as in a quarrel); ಕಡಿದವನ ಪಾಪ ಖಡ್ಗ ಮಾಡಿದವನಿಗುಂಟೆ? kaḍidavana pāpa khaḍga māḍidavaniguṇṭe? responsibility of not using a means for a vile purpose lies on the user rather than on the inventor of that means.
a relatively thin, broad piece cut from an object having some bulk or volume or a whole; a bit; a slice; a fragment.
the coarse flour of a grain, corn etc.
(in comp.) sharp; acute; harsh; biting; sever.
the part of the human body below the ribs and above the hips, usu. of smaller circumference than these; the narrower middle part of the normal human figure; the waist.
a kind of liquid food made with buttermilk, vegetables, spices, etc.; curds mixed with salt, chillies, mustard, etc. and some rice flour boiled and seasoned.
an oblong roll of cotton thread.
a fold of skin over the navel.
an assurance that one will or will not undertake a certain action, behaviour, etc.; a promise.
the end or corner of a thing.
a strong man.
a butcher - a) a person whose trade it is to slaughter domestic animals for food; b) a person who sells the flesh of such animals; c) a person who delights in killing.
a piece or part cut off or out; esp. - a) any of the segments of the carcass of a meat animal; b) a slice from such a segment; a cut.
to cut into pieces.
to cause to cut into pieces.

a piece; a cut; a segment.

a big box or a metal container for storing foods or other articles for a time.
to cut; to separate; to severe.
to gain momentum; to get more speed or force.

2) (dial.) a granary; a corn-bin a) a room, building for storing grains, corns, etc.; b) a big bamboo basket for the same purpose; c) a thick, strong bamboo mat which can be rolled into a cylindrical structure for storing grains.

the fact or an instance of (the skin) getting itching sensation.
the intense sexual desire.

the act, process or an instance of cutting, severing or separating.

a black canvas to write on with a piece of chalk; a canvas board.
a set of papers, documents or records; a file.
the chequered dice-cloth used to play chess, dice, etc. on.

little scales or flakes of dead skin formed on the scalp.
the act or fact of controlling; power to direct or regulate; control.

a man who cuts, severes, kills, etc. (something).
a weapon consisting of long blades on both the sides, fixed in a hilt with a guard for the hand, used for cutting or thrusting; a double-edged sword.
a broad piece of defensive armour usu. made of metal, and used to protect the body in fighting; a shield.
a head cut off from the rest of the body.
a man (a soldier) who fights with a sword holding a shield.
